channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5961] SEO - URL Duplication Issues - Wrong meta robots instructions on category url with query strings
item.description:
Observations :

  • To avoid duplicate content on the hybris plateform, a meta canonical and robots have been implemented on category pages.
  • The current meta on category pages :
    exemple on www : http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Automation/Fach--und-Datenb%C3%BCcher/Fachb%C3%BCcher-auf-Franz%C3%B6sisch/Electronique-Electrotechnique/c/cat-DC-74733?q=*&filter_Category3=Fachb%C3%BCcher+auf+Franz%C3%B6sisch&filter_Category4=Electronique+%2F+Electrotechnique
    <meta name="robots" content="no-index,follow" />

Impacts :

  • This meta robots instruction is wrongly written.
  • Google can't & don't understand it (https://developers.google.com/webmasters/control-crawl-index/docs/robots_meta_tag?csw=1)
  • The duplication on category pages with query string is not properly corrected.

Demands :

  • Replace the instruction : 
    <meta name="robots" content="no-index,follow" />

    By this one :

    <meta name="robots" content="noindex, follow" />

    On category pages (pages containing /c/ in the url) with query string.

  • Category pages without query string must remain with this tag : 
    <meta name="robots" content="index, follow" />

Checking process :

  • The correction must be deployed on Q before Production environment to properly test it.
  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Duplication Issues - Wrong meta robots instructions on category url with query strings

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5924] HU - FE issues detailpage
item.description:
Issue
Please have a look a the screenshot.

  1. Overlapping text (HU, ...): Is it possible to have a line-break there?
  2. The button is not placed correctly. Please fix.
  3. Cookie-button too small for text(HU, ...): Button should be enlarged, probably the whole overlay a bit.

Please check if the issues are present as well on RO, CZ, SK. If so please note in the ticket and fix too.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The "Add to Cart" button moves down because the text inside the button is too long. As well as the text of the numeric selector on its left.
The overlapping issue on the price looks like a cache/fonts issue. I can't reproduce it.
Cookie-button witdh increased to 55px to avoid the weird display

The overlapping issue on the price looks like a cache/fonts issue. I can't reproduce it.
--> Correction: No cache issue. Typekit is not loaded (403 Forbidden)

403 Forbidden error when loading Typekit for eastern countries.

The file that contains the typekit definition is:

\hybris\bin\custom\distrelecB2Bstorefront\web\webroot\WEB-INF\config\spring-mvc-config.xml

We should add the values for the eastern countries:

<entry key="distrelec.cz" value="???????" />
<entry key="distrelec.hu" value="???????" />
<entry key="distrelec.ro" value="???????" />
<entry key="distrelec.sk" value="???????" />
@Ruben: With the next deployment the typekit configuration is fixed. But if all the frontend styling issue are fixed with that I can not say. So please check afterwards shortly if everything is fine.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5975] Add IT translation to search box
item.description:
Here's the Italian translation for the empty searches:

IT: Prego inserire un termine per la ricerca

Can you please add that?
item.summary: Add IT translation to search box

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please add this to the property-translations, thx.
fixed. Also available in production.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5963] Cannot save sub-user, forces to enter login/email address
item.description:
test.distrelec.ch

  • Log in as a test user, e.g. distrelec.testing+17@gmail.com / distrelec
  • open a sub user. note that there are the labels "Login" and "E-Mail-Address", both show the email address behind, both are not editable
  • change something, e.g. the budget, and save
  • an error appears "Please correct the errors below.". The two fields are now gone, there now only one "Login / E-Mail Address", with an empty input field
item.summary: Cannot save sub-user, forces to enter login/email address

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Florian,
I'm not sure what the desired behavior for this case should be, but I'm pretty sure the way it works at the moment is wrong. Please advise.
Thanks

Yes it is wrong.
The error should not appear.
It should be the same case as for the admin user --> Sceenshot.
I dont see any problem. Please see the screenshot.
the problem occurs for sub-users in user management, not for the logged-in user

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5962] IT// Issues with the price updates
item.description:
Hi Oana,

below you can see the Italian ICT newsletter.
I normally send it out on Friday but unfortunately today the price are not updated online, neither this morning and this afternoon too.

The prices were in the ERP (AS400) since yesterday afternoon (Thursday).
I expected to see the prices updated online this morning (Friday) and send the NL but I can’t.
I waited the afternoon but they were not online again.
Below the screens shot of the prices that are different from NL.

And one of this items, the 168807, is not online.

IMPORTANT
It happened often Friday morning that the prices for the newsletter were not updated online.
My colleagues, here in Italy, put the price for newsletter on Thursday afternoon in AS400 but we don’t see them online on Friday morning.
And so I have to send out the newsletter on Friday afternoon and it is not the best 
Can you please check?

Thanks for help! 

Federica Borella
E-Mail Marketing Specialist

Distrelec Italia S.r.l.
Succursale di Daetwyler Svizzera SA
Via Canova 46/50
20020 Lainate / Italy
T +39 02 93 755 779
F +39 02 93 755 751
federica.borella@distrelec.com
www.distrelec.com
item.summary: IT// Issues with the price updates

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please check why the product "168807" is not online and what's the reason for the price differences(missing import?). thx

Hi
the product 11073485 (movex code: 168807) has been punch-out for italy as you can see here:

It seems that the last file that was containing the prices for this product has been imported

 file: erp_price-D3P272-20141209002058000.csv

But on the system there are no price rows that has been imported within this sequence (file): 20141209002058000

The price has not been updated because in the last file: erp_price-D3P272-20141209002058000.csv the price condition Movex110734857330 has an old lastModifiedERPDate (20141204001443) as you can see here:

In hybris, the last valid price rows for the condition Movex110734857330 has the lastModifiedERPDate set to: 20141204131323 as you can see here:

The price rows are not updated if the lastModifiedERPDate defined in the erp_price file are older than the lastModifiedERPDate already present in the same price row in hybris.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5735] German data in non-German FF feeds for campaign tag
item.description:
We have the same German data in all the FF feeds for Campaign Tag (cf. attached Excel File for CH-FR from this morning).

This is causing some bad search results, as FF finds similarities where there are none.

And at the same time, the correct data in the different channels is missing, which prevents FACT-Finder from finding correct results for these queries.
item.summary: German data in non-German FF feeds for campaign tag

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela
i will setup a meeting together with you because i don't understand what's the issue.

As discussed with Daniela the following fields on the product must be localized (see screenshoot).

  • seoCampaignTag
  • codeCompetitorMultiValue

At the moment these values are imported from PIM only in german language.
What's the status here?

I'm currently working on it.
The issue has been implemented, i'm currently testing locally.

The implementation is complete, but we have to import the full pim information for all the languages.
Before doing that we have to reset all the hashes in hybris, so the pim import will affect all the products.
